divs: Sighting DetailsThe object appeared to move slowly almost with a slight bounce to it,moved a top the tree line. With only the cold red which was very bright. Outdated no flash. No sound. Continued to fly out of sight at the same height. When almost out of sight I noticed in my peripheral view an object come straight up from center of tree line which started to follow same path but object was more star like than an object or disc shape like the first one. Couldn't see first objects shape unroll it hit a little light then almost positive I saw disc shape. Lasted five minutes
Summary: pulled on side of road on way back to my boyfriends house because we both saw a very very bright deep red pulsating light coming from an object
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Polk City
There were no other sightings in Polk City on or around August 27th 2013
